References to All Classes of the Reflexxes API

The API of any Reflexxes Motion Library was designed to be very compact and easy-to-use. The only relevant class for user applications is

  • ReflexxesAPI

with its two methods ReflexxesAPI::RMLPosition() to execute the position-based Online Trajectory Generation algorithm and ReflexxesAPI::RMLVelocity() for the velocity-based algorithm. These two methods make use of the classes

  • RMLInputParameters

    • RMLPositionInputParameters
    • RMLVelocityInputParameters

  • RMLOutputParameters

    • RMLPositionOutputParameters
    • RMLVelocityOutputParameters

  • RMLFlags

    • RMLPositionFlags
    • RMLVelocityFlags

which furthermore use the simple vector class

  • RMLVector.

All classes mentioned on this website constitute the entire API of the Type IV Reflexxes Motion Library.
